text:
Dear #Canadian journalists in all media forms & languages,

Would your org be willing to help us get the word out about #COVID19 #Vaccine Q&A sessions available to all Canadians, in 20 languages?

If so, we need your help. Our comms contact: @DeNovo_Fatima 

cc @picardonhealth https://t.co/n5BN9YwtMO
